## MapViewOptions.movementThrottleTimeout property

Maximum timeout, in milliseconds, before a \[\[MOVEMENT\_FINISHED\_EVENT\]\] is sent after the latest frame with a camera movement. The default is 300ms.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
movementThrottleTimeout?: number;
```
